section.name: Damontir the Mad
section.p: Haunted by memories of a former life in which he wielded great power, Damontir would willingly pledge his lifeblood to the demons of darkness if he stood to gain a snippet of magical lore. Power is his only goal, and so his primary objective is to enrol at one of the sorcerous academies in Dweomer.
You can play as Damontir, or as a mage with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
